reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The project strengthens ZNAS capacity to communicate with its members and external stakeholders. Linked to that it will improve ZNAS capacity to collect and disseminate factual information for policy formulation purposes. It will help further mature the st rategic plan and strengthen the delivery of associations? membership services. The expected results include the following:?Enhanced internal and external communication?Advancement of the ZNAS strategic plan to the next level?Enhanced capacity for collecti on generation and dissemination of information for policy formulation to branches and other stake holders?Development of a monitoring and review mechanism for the harvesting movement and trade in timber ?Improved business management skills for members
